TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChartNamedElement extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement

Docs.summary: Represents the base class for most chart elements. Chart elements such as series, chart areas, and legends must have unique names, and reuse the unique name generation and validation logic provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection%601> class.

Docs.param: The name of the new chart element.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified chart element name.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Name { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the chart element.
Docs.value: A value that represents the name of the chart element.
